name: Gaming Monitor HyperX Armada 27" (64V69AA) - Black
origAbout: HyperX Armada Gaming Monitors are the first gaming monitors to include the monitor head and ergonomic arm right in the box. You’ll save yourself the hassle of hunting for a compatible desk mount, and you’ll spend it soaking in the exquisite visuals of the QHD Armada 27 with DisplayHDR™ 400 instead. Speaking of time, the 165Hz refresh rate and 1ms response time can help you gain precious split-seconds that could make the difference between victory and respawning. Further enhance your gaming experience with NVIDIA® G-SYNC®, which eliminates screen tearing, stuttering and input lag.
